comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/58465695@N03] Thanks shoetig! Yes, looks like Newcastle Regional Museum has the same image and they have identified it as Leconfield Colliery: hosting.collectionsaustralia.net/newcastle/greta/leconflp... -AG
